name: Sergey Mechtaev
content: Sergey Mechtaev Sergey Mechtaev / 谢辽夏 Address Science Building #1, Peking University, No. 5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District, Beijing, 100871, P.R.China Office 1542 Phone +44 7935 602 279 Email mechtaev@pku.edu.cn GitHub github.com/mechtaev Twitter x.com/sergey_mechtaev I am an Assistant Professor at Peking University's School of Computer Science. Previously, I was a faculty member at University College London. I received a PhD from the National University of Singapore, and a Specialist Diploma from Saint Petersburg State University.
